verbs.description: six things every woman [V: should] know about menopause weight gain if you 've noticed your weight increasing as you go through menopause you 've probably also found that it difficult to find advice that works as a doctor who only sees women over 40 in my weight loss clinic dealing with weight gain at menopause is something i have a lot of experience in menopause
